verses.roman:
kintu āmāra ye kichu sukha, saba tomā lañā
tomāra yogya nahe,--yābe āmāre chāḍiyā"

synonyms: kintu—but; āmāra—My; ye—whatever; kichu—any; sukha—happiness; saba—all; tomā lañā—because of your association; tomāra—for you; yogya nahe—it is not fit; yābe—you will go away; āmāre chāḍiyā—leaving Me aside.
translation: "But whatever happiness is Mine is all due to your association. It is not fitting for you to go away and leave Me aside."
